mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MBTI_MEMO (MEMO_NAME, MEMO_AGE, MEMO_SEX, MEMO_RELATION,MEMO_SUBMIT_DATE, MBTI,DEVICE_PK) VALUES (#{memoName}, #{memoAge}, #{memoSex}, #{memoRelation},now(), #{mbti},#{devicePk})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMO_ID FROM MBTI_MEMO WHERE MEMO_ID = #{memoId}
SELECT DEVICE_PK , DEVICE_ID FROM DEVICE WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId}
SELECT MEMO_ID , MEMO_NAME , MEMO_AGE , MEMO_SEX , MEMO_RELATION , MEMO_SUBMIT_DATE , MBTI , DEVICE_PK FROM MBTI_MEMO WHERE DEVICE_PK = #{deviceId} AND MEMO_ID = #{memoId}

SELECT A.DEVICE_PK, A.DEVICE_ID, B.MEMO_ID, B.DEVICE_PK, B.MEMO_NAME, B.MEMO_AGE, B.MEMO_SEX, B.MEMO_RELATION, B.MEMO_SUBMIT_DATE, B.MBTI FROM DEVICE A JOIN MBTI_MEMO B ON A.DEVICE_PK = B.DEVICE_PK WHERE A.DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId}
